## AsyncSeriesWaterfallHook.callPromise() method

\* call listener with `...args`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
callPromise(...args: AsArray<T>): Promise<R>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  args | <code>AsArray&lt;T&gt;</code> | rest parameters of calling arguments |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<R>`

Promise indicated whether calling succeed or failed If calling succeed, promise was resolved with waterfall value.
